name: Kubik 3D
description:
Your favourite game from the old times, returned with more fun and enjoyable gameplay. Challenge yourself with the blitz amazing classic game ever made. Enjoy the classic mode and the new 3d mode together it would blast your mind then you will get frenzy. Build with blocks, bicks puzzle your mind in the 3d mode.

play now for free and get mania!!

Game features
Clean and colorful user interface
2D and 3D mode of playing
Simple and easy control
Supports google leaderboard
Supports google Achievement
